# ui-button

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                                                             | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | Default              |
| ------------ | ------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------- |
| `disabled`   | `disabled`    | Whether or not this button is disabled.                                                 | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | `false`              |
| `href`       | `href`        | The location this button should link to.                                                | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | `null`               |
| `outline`    | `outline`     | Whether or not this button should use the outline styles for the provided theme or not. | `boolean \| { xs?: boolean; sm?: boolean; md?: boolean; lg?: boolean; xl?: boolean; }`                                                                                                                                                                              | `false`              |
| `size`       | `size`        | The size of this button.                                                                | `Size.LARGE \| Size.NORMAL \| Size.SMALL \| { xs?: Size; sm?: Size; md?: Size; lg?: Size; xl?: Size; }`                                                                                                                                                             | `Size.NORMAL`        |
| `themeColor` | `theme-color` | The theme color to be used for this button.                                             | `ThemeColor.DANGER \| ThemeColor.DARK \| ThemeColor.INFO \| ThemeColor.LIGHT \| ThemeColor.PRIMARY \| ThemeColor.SECONDARY \| ThemeColor.SUCCESS \| ThemeColor.WARNING \| { xs?: ThemeColor; sm?: ThemeColor; md?: ThemeColor; lg?: ThemeColor; xl?: ThemeColor; }` | `ThemeColor.PRIMARY` |
